description: Combine your comfiest hoody, warmest flannel, and toughest, most stylish chore coat into one super-versatile shirt jacket that feels equally at home in cold weather hopping around the mountain, the town, or the tool shed. Throw in our prime-time PrimaLoft® insulation and you've got a mind-bogglingly warm winter coat that can do it all in the cold. It's the perfect combination of soft, casual comfort and high-performance insulation for on-the-go weekend hikers and urban explorers.
name: Marmot Lanigan Flannel Chore Coat - Mens
